AI Description: libev is a high-performance event loop that provides a full-featured alternative to the event loop provided by the standard C library. It is designed for high scalability and low latency applications.
Core Features: Supports Multiple Event Types Including I/O Events, Signal Events, & Timer Events, Efficient & Scalable Event Processing Using Optimized Data Structures, Supports Priority Queues For Event Scheduling, Provides A Simple & Easy-To-Use Interface For Event Handling, Platform-Independent & Supports Multiple Operating Systems
General Tags: Event Loop, High Performance, Scalable, Low Latency, Operating System Independent
